meanings.definition: Relating to the study of aging and elderly individuals.
meanings.sent1: The gerontologic research team conducted a study on the effects of aging on memory.
meanings.sent2: She attended a gerontologic conference to learn more about caring for the elderly.
meanings.sent3: The gerontologic professor joked that studying wrinkles was their specialty.
meanings.sent4: Her gerontologic approach to understanding longevity was both insightful and practical.
meanings.sent5: The gerontologic textbook provided a comprehensive overview of aging theories.

meanings.definition: Involving the care and treatment of older adults.
meanings.sent1: The gerontologic nurse specialized in providing medical care for the elderly.
meanings.sent2: They implemented gerontologic practices to improve the quality of life for seniors.
meanings.sent3: The gerontologic facility organized a fun bingo night for the residents.
meanings.sent4: His gerontologic skills in managing age-related conditions were highly respected.
meanings.sent5: The gerontologic program offered valuable training for caregivers of older adults.
